title: Ursula von der Leyen – 2022 Statement at the “Grain from Ukraine” Summit
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Ursula von der Leyen, the President of the European Commission, on 26 November 2022.
content:
Thank you, dear Volodymyr, for convening us on this very important day.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London

This meeting falls on the Holodomor memorial day – when 90 years ago, hunger was used as a weapon by the Soviet Union against the Ukrainian people.
